systemDescription.name: Door Lock Control Interface Module
systemDescription.description: The door lock control interface in the IVI system allows users to lock or unlock vehicle doors through touch interface or voice commands. It communicates with the Body Control Module (BCM) via CAN bus to execute the requested functions.

safetyGoals.description: The door lock control system shall prevent unintended door lock/unlock operations that could compromise vehicle security or occupant safety
safetyGoals.rationale: Unauthorized door operations could lead to security breaches or occupant safety issues during vehicle operation

decomposedRequirements.description: The IVI system shall authenticate all door lock control messages using message authentication code
The IVI system shall validate user input for door lock controls before sending commands to the BCM
The IVI system shall provide clear visual confirmation of door lock status changes

safetyGoals.description: The door lock control system shall maintain integrity of communication between IVI and Body Control Module
safetyGoals.rationale: Compromised communication could lead to unauthorized commands or loss of control functionality

decomposedRequirements.description: The IVI system shall implement anomaly detection for door lock control CAN messages
The IVI system shall implement redundant verification for safety-critical door lock operations

hazardAnalysis.description: Unintended door unlocking while vehicle is in motion
hazardAnalysis.operationalSituation: Vehicle in motion at highway speeds
hazardAnalysis.hazardousEvent: Door opening during driving due to inadvertent unlock command

hazardAnalysis.description: Unauthorized door operations through compromised IVI system
hazardAnalysis.hazardousEvent: Unauthorized access to vehicle or distraction due to unexpected door operations

hazardAnalysis.description: Inability to operate door locks in emergency situation
hazardAnalysis.operationalSituation: Vehicle in emergency situation (accident, fire, etc.)
hazardAnalysis.hazardousEvent: Occupants unable to exit vehicle or first responders unable to enter

safetyMechanisms.mechanism: Software watchdog monitors door lock control responsiveness
safetyMechanisms.implementationDetails: Software checks if door lock control UI responds to user input within 300ms; if not, system attempts recovery and notifies user

safetyMechanisms.mechanism: HMAC-SHA256 for door lock control messages

safetyMechanisms.mechanism: Vehicle state validation for door commands
